makerbit.connectUltrasonic: Configures the ultrasonic sensor and measures continuously in the background.
makerbit.connectUltrasonic|param|echo: pin connected to echo, eg: DigitalPin.P8
makerbit.connectUltrasonic|param|trig: pin connected to trig, eg: DigitalPin.P5
makerbit.getUltrasonicDistance:
Get the distance to an object and returns the result in a range
from 1 to 300 centimeters or up to 118 inch.
The maximum value is returned to indicate when no object was detected.
-1 is returned when the device is not connected.
makerbit.isUltrasonicDistanceLessThan:
Returns `true` if an object is within distance. `false` otherwise.
* @param distance distance to object, eg: 10
